entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 600 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023
